messages.subject: Re: New Group for Homeschool Teens
messages.msgSnippet: ... closely ... be safe .. ... Hi Teresa, So much had happened on the message board since my last message. Wow! Thanks for taking on the project.  I Haven t
messages.messageBody:
--- In Unschooling-dotcom@y..., "Teresa" <grlynbl@a...> wrote:
> I have created a new group for HS teens. The group will be
closely
> moderated and managed, so be assured that your teen will
be "safe"..
> Please check out the group and encourage your teen to join
>
> <center>
> <a href="http://groups.yahoo.com/group/HSTCon/join">
> <img src="http://groups.yahoo.com/img/ui/join.gif" border=0><br>
> Click to subscribe to HSTCon</a>
> </center>


Hi Teresa,
So much had happened on the message board since my last message.
Wow!
Thanks for taking on the project. I Haven't gone to the new group
yet, but have told my boy about it and he actually sounded interested
in joining up. YES! He is in an archeologist mode now and digging
a big whole on our property and finding some interesting objects
pretty deep down in the ground. He wants to share that.
Anyway I wish you good luck, sounds like a good thing to me. Hope
it takes off.
Blessing,
Govinda

messages.subject: New Group for Homeschool Teens
messages.msgSnippet: I have created a new group for HS teens.  The group will be closely moderated and managed, so be assured that your teen will be safe .. Please check out the
messages.messageBody:
I have created a new group for HS teens. The group will be closely
moderated and managed, so be assured that your teen will be "safe"..
Please check out the group and encourage your teen to join

<center>
<a href="http://groups.yahoo.com/group/HSTCon/join">
<img src="http://groups.yahoo.com/img/ui/join.gif" border=0><br>
Click to subscribe to HSTCon</a>
</center>
